Sentencas: Developing highly effective catalysts for oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) is crucial to enable the low-temperature operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: F-doped LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-? cathodes with enhanced ORR catalytic activity for LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Recent studies have proposed a promising O2-/H+/e- conducting oxide, LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-delta (LNCA) with good ORR catalytic activity for SOFC cathode uses.
Titulo: F-doped LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-? cathodes with enhanced ORR catalytic activity for LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Herein, to further optimize the cathode functionality of LNCA, a fluorine anion (F-) doping strategy is ap-plied to develop highly active LNCAF0.1 and LNCAF0.2 cathodes for Sm-doped ceria (SDC) electrolyte-based SOFCs.
Titulo: F-doped LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-? cathodes with enhanced ORR catalytic activity for LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: It is found the successful doping of F- in the oxygen site of LNCA leads to improved oxygen ionic conductivity and facilitated surface exchange and bulk diffusion of oxygen in LNCAF0.1 and LNCAF0.2, which thus gain distinctly promoted ORR catalytic activity at 450-550 degrees C, as confirmed by the decreased area specific resistances (ASR) and activation energy on symmetrical cells.
Titulo: F-doped LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-? cathodes with enhanced ORR catalytic activity for LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The as-fabricated two SDC-based SOFCs with LNCAF0.1 and LNCAF0.2 cathodes exhibit peak power densities of 497 and 591 mW cm-2 at 550 degrees C, respectively, which are higher than that of the cell with LNCA cathode.
Titulo: F-doped LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-? cathodes with enhanced ORR catalytic activity for LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Furthermore, the single cell with the best-performing LNCAF0.2 cathode demonstrates a good stability for 110 h at 550 degrees C.
Titulo: F-doped LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-? cathodes with enhanced ORR catalytic activity for LT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The present study thus provides a feasible strategy of F anion doping to promote the ORR catalytic activity of LNCA cathode for developing low-temperature SOFCs.(c) 2023
Titulo: F-doped LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-? cathodes with enhanced ORR catalytic activity for LT-SOFCs
F-doped LiNi0.8Co0.15Al0.05O2-? cathodes with enhanced ORR catalytic activity for LT-SOFCs
